languages.text: {n}Молниеносно выхватив пистолет из кобуры, Владайм... улыбается.{/n} "Я знал, что наша маленькая война закончится именно этим. Что же, сделаем все так, как это принято на Футфоле. Все, кому я плачу троны — к бою!"

{n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I knew this was exactly how our little war was going to end. All right, then, let's do this the Footfall way. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молниеносно выхватив пистолет из кобуры, Владайм... улыбается.{/n} "Я знал, что наша маленькая война закончится именно этим. Что же, сделаем все так, как это принято на Футфоле. Все, кому я плачу троны — к бою!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I knew this was exactly how our little war was going to end. All right then, let's do this the Footfall way. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

{n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I knew this was exactly how our little war was going to end. All right then, let's do this the Footfall way. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you go to battle!"

{n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I knew this was exactly how our little war was going to end. All right, then, let's do this the Footfall way. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you go to battle!"

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆以闪电般的速度，从枪套里拔出了手枪，然后……微笑起来。{/n}“我早就知道，我们之间的战争会以这种方式结束。很好，既然如此，就用落脚港惯用的方式来解决问题吧。所有人，既然你们都拿了我的钱，那就都得上战场！”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I knew this was exactly how our little war was going to end. All right, then, let's do this the Footfall way. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆以闪电般的速度，从枪套里拔出了手枪，然后……微笑起来。{/n}“我早就知道，我们之间的战争会以这种方式结束。很好，既然如此，就用落脚港惯用的方式来解决问题吧。所有人，既然你们都拿了我的钱，那就都得上战场！”
{n}弗拉迪姆以闪电般的速度，从枪套里拔出了手枪，然后……微笑起来。{/n}“我早就知道，我们之间的战争会以这种方式结束。很好，既然如此，就用落脚港惯用的方式来解决问题吧。所有人，既然你们都拿了我的钱，那就都得上战场！”

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは光のように速く、ホルスターからピストルを取り出して、ニヤリと笑った。{/n}「小っさい戦争がこういう結末を迎えるだろうと、思ってたよ。よし。フットフォールのやり方で終わらせよう。おい、全員聞け！私がスローンを払うということは…いざ、戦へ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I knew this was exactly how our little war was going to end. All right, then, let's do this the Footfall way. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは光のように速く、ホルスターからピストルを取り出して、ニヤリと笑った。{/n}「小っさい戦争がこういう結末を迎えるだろうと、思ってたよ。よし。フットフォールのやり方で終わらせよう。おい、全員聞け！私がスローンを払うということは…いざ、戦へ！」
{n}ヴラダイムは光のように速く、ホルスターからピストルを取り出して、ニヤリと笑った。{/n}「小っさい戦争がこういう結末を迎えるだろうと、思ってたよ。よし。フットフォールのやり方で終わらせよう。おい、全員聞け！私がスローンを払うということは…いざ、戦へ！」

languages.text: {n}Vladaym saca su pistola de la funda rápido como un rayo y sonríe.{/n} «Sabía perfectamente cómo iba a acabar nuestra guerrecilla. Muy bien, hagámoslo como se hace en Paso. Todos, y cuando digo todos es todos, ¡a la batalla!».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I knew this was exactly how our little war was going to end. All right, then, let's do this the Footfall way. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym saca su pistola de la funda rápido como un rayo y sonríe.{/n} «Sabía perfectamente cómo iba a acabar nuestra guerrecilla. Muy bien, hagámoslo como se hace en Paso. Todos, y cuando digo todos es todos, ¡a la batalla!».

languages.text: {n}Vladaym zieht blitzschnell seine Pistole aus ihrem Halfter und ... lächelt.{/n} "Ich wusste, dass unser kleiner Krieg genau so enden würde. Also gut, dann machen wir es nach guter alter Footfall-Art. Alle Mann — und das schließt jeden ein, dem ich Thronmünzen bezahle — in den Kampf!"
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I knew this was exactly how our little war was going to end. All right, then, let's do this the Footfall way. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym zieht blitzschnell seine Pistole aus ihrem Halfter und ... lächelt.{/n} "Ich wusste, dass unser kleiner Krieg genau so enden würde. Also gut, dann machen wir es nach guter alter Footfall-Art. Alle hergehört — wenn ich Euch Thronmünzen bezahle, dann zieht Ihr jetzt in den Kampf!"

{n}Vladaym zieht blitzschnell seine Pistole aus ihrem Halfter und ... lächelt.{/n} "Ich wusste, dass unser kleiner Krieg genau so enden würde. Also gut, dann machen wir es nach guter alter Footfall-Art. Alle hergehört — wenn ich Euch Thronmünzen bezahle, dann zieht Ihr jetzt in den Kampf!"

languages.text: {n}Rapide comme l'éclair, Vladaym sort son pistolet de son étui et... sourit.{/n} « Je savais que notre petite guerre se terminerait ainsi. Très bien, réglons ça à la mode de Castel. Vous tous, c'est-à-dire ceux que je paie... à l'attaque ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I knew this was exactly how our little war was going to end. All right, then, let's do this the Footfall way. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Rapide comme l'éclair, Vladaym sort son pistolet de son étui et... sourit.{/n} « Je savais que notre petite guerre se terminerait ainsi. Très bien, réglons ça à la mode de Castel. Vous tous, c'est-à-dire ceux que je paie... à l'attaque ! »

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, yıldırım hızıyla tabancasını çekip... Gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ufak çekişmemizin böyle sonuçlanacağını biliyordum zaten. Haydi bakalım, şu işi Binliman usulü halledelim. Millet! Cebinize gelt giriyorsa savaşacaksınız!"
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I knew this was exactly how our little war was going to end. All right, then, let's do this the Footfall way. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"
